pages.title: Velora Product Strategy 2024
pages.content: Velora is building the next generation of AI-powered customer support for e-commerce. Our vision is to reduce support ticket resolution time by 80% using LLMs trained on merchant-specific data. Key differentiators: 1) Auto-learns from past tickets, 2) Integrates with Shopify/WooCommerce natively, 3) Multilingual support out-of-the-box. Target market: Mid-size e-commerce brands doing $10M-$100M ARR. Go-to-market: Product-led growth with freemium tier.

pages.title: Competitive Landscape Analysis
pages.content: Main competitors: Intercom (enterprise focus, $50k+ ACV), Zendesk (legacy, slow innovation), Gorgias (e-commerce specialized but expensive). Our positioning: Modern AI-native solution at 1/3 the price of Gorgias. Key advantages: Better Shopify integration, 10x faster setup (5 mins vs 2 hours), automatic intent detection. Weaknesses: Smaller team (15 vs 200+), limited enterprise features. Strategy: Win SMB market first, move upmarket in 2025.

pages.title: Q1 2024 Roadmap
pages.content: January: Ship Shopify app v2 with auto-reply feature. February: Launch WhatsApp Business integration (huge demand from EU customers). March: Implement sentiment analysis and escalation rules. April: Multi-language support for Spanish, French, German. Key metrics to hit: 100 paying customers, $15k MRR, <2min average response time. Engineering priorities: Improve LLM response quality, reduce latency to <500ms, implement proper rate limiting.

pages.title: Engineering Team Structure
pages.content: Backend Team (4 engineers): Python/FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Redis. Focus on LLM pipeline and integrations. Frontend Team (3 engineers): React/TypeScript, building merchant dashboard and chat widget. AI/ML Team (2 engineers): Fine-tuning models, RAG implementation, vector search optimization. DevOps (1 engineer): AWS infrastructure, CI/CD, monitoring. Weekly demos on Fridays, daily standups at 9am PT.

pages.title: Customer Success Playbook
pages.content: Onboarding process: 1) 15-min setup call, 2) Install Shopify app, 3) Import historical tickets, 4) Train on merchant's knowledge base, 5) Test with real customers in 'assist mode' first week. Success metrics: Time to first auto-reply (<24 hours), CSAT score (>4.5/5), Deflection rate (>60%). Common issues: Integration timeouts (fix: retry logic), Slow responses (fix: cache common queries), Wrong language detection (fix: use customer profile). Escalation: Slack #customer-emergency channel.

pages.title: Sales Playbook 2024
pages.content: Target customers: E-commerce brands doing $10M-$100M ARR with 100+ support tickets per month. ICP: Head of CX, VP Operations, or CEO at mid-market DTC brands. Discovery questions: Current support volume? Current tools (Zendesk/Gorgias)? Pain points (resolution time, agent costs, multilingual)? Pricing: Start with Growth plan ($299/mo), upsell Enterprise for white-label. Common objections: 'AI sounds scary' (counter: assist mode, human review), 'We use Gorgias' (counter: show price comparison, faster setup), 'Too small' (counter: freemium tier). Close rate: 35% demo-to-paid. Sales cycle: 2-3 weeks avg.

pages.title: Company Values & Culture
pages.content: Velora values: 1) Customer obsession - Ship fast, iterate with feedback, 2) Transparency - Open salaries, public roadmap, weekly all-hands, 3) Ownership - Everyone owns outcomes, not tasks, 4) Learning - Bi-weekly demo days, education budget $2k/year, 5) Work-life balance - Unlimited PTO (minimum 3 weeks), async-first, no weekend work. Team size: 15 people (4 eng, 3 product, 2 sales, 2 CS, 2 design, 2 ops). Office: Remote-first, HQ in SF for quarterly offsites. Benefits: Competitive equity (0.5-2%), health/dental/vision, home office stipend, co-working membership.

pages.title: Security & Compliance Overview
pages.content: Velora is SOC 2 Type II compliant (audit completed Jan 2024). Data security: All data encrypted at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3). Customer data is isolated per tenant with row-level security. No PII leaves our infrastructure. GDPR compliant: Right to delete, data portability, DPA available. Infrastructure: Hosted on AWS us-east-1 and eu-west-1. Daily backups with 30-day retention. Incident response plan with 4-hour SLA for critical issues. Security contact: security@velora.ai. Penetration testing: Annual third-party pen tests (last: Dec 2023, no critical findings).

pages.title: Product Features Deep Dive
pages.content: Core features: 1) Auto-reply - AI generates responses based on knowledge base + order context, 2) Intent detection - Classifies tickets (refund, shipping, product question) for routing, 3) Sentiment analysis - Flags angry customers for priority handling, 4) Multi-language - Supports 12 languages with auto-detection, 5) Order lookup - Pulls Shopify order data into conversation, 6) Macro suggestions - Suggests canned responses for common questions, 7) Analytics - CSAT, resolution time, deflection rate dashboards. Roadmap: SMS/WhatsApp (Q1), Voice (Q2), Proactive outreach (Q3). Beta features: Auto-refund (approves refunds under $50 automatically), Product recommendations (suggests products based on query).

pages.title: Employee Onboarding Guide
pages.content: Welcome to Velora! Your first week: Day 1 - IT setup, meet the team, read mission/values docs. Day 2 - Product walkthrough with Sarah (Head of Product), install Velora on test store. Day 3 - Codebase tour (engineers) or GTM overview (sales/CS). Day 4 - Shadow customer calls or pair programming. Day 5 - First contribution (write doc, close ticket, ship small feature). Resources: Notion workspace (this!), GitHub repos (velora-api, velora-widget), Slack channels (#general, #engineering, #product, #customer-success). Buddy system: You'll be paired with a teammate for Q&A. 30-60-90 day goals set with your manager. Questions? Ask in #onboarding or DM Alex (CEO).
